#include <stdio.h>

{13, 91, 424, 1484, 4154, 9707, 19414, 29121, 42063, 59159, 75615, 88747, 95597, 95597, 89036, 80204, 65867, 51176, 37661, 26428, 17759, 11353, 6821, 4096, 2220, 1165, 605, 310, 139, 69, 27, 10, 6, 2, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 0},
{14, 105, 525, 1995, 5985, 15960, 34199, 64409, 107154, 171563, 233954, 296371, 342124, 368134, 368134, 368134, 324876, 281553, 222037, 171005, 122130, 84431, 54937, 34827, 20907, 12333, 7023, 3880, 2057, 1167, 564, 260, 129, 62, 20, 7, 1, 1, 0, 0},
{15, 120, 640, 2560, 8192, 21888, 50030, 100060, 178236, 285074, 414662, 554018, 681778, 779164, 831886, 831886, 782347, 701717, 591178, 473607, 361604, 263114, 183069, 121870, 78013, 48065, 28497, 16204, 8852, 4742, 2457, 1216, 565, 259, 124, 46, 21, 10, 3, 0}
};
 
int main()
{
	int T,t;
	scanf("%d", &T);
 
	for(t = 0; t < T; t++)
	{
		int b, d;
		scanf("%d", &b);	
		scanf("%d", &d);
 
		if (d > 40)
			printf("0\n");
		else
			printf("%d\n", P[b][d - 1]);	
	}	
 
	return 0;
}
